channel.title: 37signals Podcast
channel.description: A look at the world of 37signals, the Chicago-based web application company. Discussions about business, design, experience, simplicity, and more. Featuring Jason Fried and David Heinemeier Hansson.
channel.itunes:summary: A look at the world of 37signals, the Chicago-based web application company. Discussions about business, design, experience, simplicity, and more. Featuring Jason Fried and David Heinemeier Hansson.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A behind the scenes look at 37signals.
channel.itunes:keywords: 37signals,podcast,Jason Fried,David Heinemeier Hansson,Matt Linderman,web,internet,entrepreneurship,business,design,experience,Rework,Getting Real,Basecamp,Highrise,Backpack,Ruby on Rails
